author: Carl Sagan
quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

author: Psalm 19:1
quote: The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quote: For me, I am driven by two main philosophies, know more today about the world than I knew yesterday and lessen the suffering of others.

author: Star Wars
quote: The Force will be with you. Always.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use.

author: Star Trek
quote: To boldly go where no man has gone before.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet.

author: Isaiah 40:26
quote: Lift up your eyes and look to the heavens: Who created all these? He who brings out the starry host one by one.

author: Yoda, Star Wars
quote: Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter.

author: Ann Druyan
quote: The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff. We are a way for the universe to know itself.

author: Buzz Aldrin
quote: Mars is there, waiting to be reached.

author: Genesis 1:16
quote: God made two great lights—the greater light to govern the day and the lesser light to govern the night.

author: Spock, Star Trek
quote: The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few.

author: Mae Jemison
quote: Never be limited by other people’s limited imaginations.

author: Edwin Hubble
quote: Equipped with his five senses, man explores the universe around him and calls the adventure Science.
